column2: This mod includes a large number of extremely-powerful targetted decisions, which allow the host a huge amount of control over an ongoing game. These are flagged with the special "§P(ED:MP:Intf)§!" prefix in the right-click menu. Due to the potential for accidental game-ruining error, §Yyou should keep these decisions hidden at all times unless you are actively using them§!.
All applicable §P(ED:MP:Intf)§! targetted decisions will be visible.\n§M! ! ! Be very careful ! ! !§!

This mod includes a large number of extremely-powerful targetted decisions, which allow the host a huge amount of control over an ongoing game. These are flagged with the special "§P(ED:MP:Intf)§!" prefix in the right-click menu. Due to the potential for accidental game-ruining error, §Yyou should keep these decisions hidden at all times unless you are actively using them§!.
All §P(ED:MP:Intf)§! targetted decisions will be hidden.

This mod sends notifications to all current players whenever the host takes an "Interference" action.

Normally, the host (ie. you) is excluded from these notifications. (You don't need a notification to tell you about your most-recent mouse-click.)

§YBy taking this decision, you will include yourself in these notifications§! (eg. for debugging purposes).
You WILL receive notifications of future "Interference" actions

This mod sends notifications to all current players whenever the host takes an "Interference" action.

Normally, the host (ie. you) is excluded from these notifications. (You don't need a notification to tell you about your most-recent mouse-click.)

Currently, §Yyou have chosen to receive these notifications§! (eg. for debugging purposes).

§YBy taking this decision, you will revert to the default setup, where you will NOT receive these notifications.§!
You WILL NOT receive notifications of future "Interference" actions
Force one of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s wars to end in a white peace.
Create a §Ybilateral§! 10-year truce between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and another character.
Break a truce between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and another character.
Create a non-aggression pact between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and another character.
Break a non-aggression pact between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and another character.
Create an alliance between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and another character.
Break an alliance between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and another character.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] is imprisoned by a human player.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] grants a favor to a human player.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] is moved to a human player's court.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will be granted §YTemporary Vitality§! (§G+20 Health§!) for §Y3 years§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s §YTemporary Vitality§! (§G+20 Health§!) will be §Gprolonged§! for §Y3 years§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will be granted §YTemporary Large Demesne§! (§G+1000 Demesne Limit§!) for §Y3 years§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s §YTemporary Large Demesne§! (§G+1000 Demesne Limit§!) will be §Gprolonged§! for §Y3 years§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s §YTemporary Large Demesne§! (§G+1000 Demesne Limit§!) will be §Rrevoked§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] is granted §G+100 Trade Post Limit§! for §Y3 years§!.
All of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s levies, across all of [Root.GetHerHis] count- and baron-tier holdings, will be §Grefilled§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] §Gregains§! all wealth that was previously removed (via the §Y"Poverty"§! decision).
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] §Ggains 1,000 offmap currency§! with the selected offmap power.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] §Rloses 1,000 offmap currency§! with the selected offmap power.
Grant the §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§! to the specified player.
Grant a strong inheritable claim on the §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§! to the specified player.
Remove a single character's claim on the §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§!.
Remove ALL characters' claims on the §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§!.
Move the traditional capital of §Y[Root.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s primary title (§Y[Root.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetFullBaseName]§!) to §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§!.
Remove common negative province modifiers from §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§!.
Change the provincial culture of §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! to that of its owner.
Change the provincial religion of §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! to that of its owner.
Change the provincial culture of §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! to that of a random neighbouring province.
Change the provincial religion of §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! to that of a random neighbouring province.

A §Ybilateral§! 10-year truce is created between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].\n(They will not be able to attack each other for 10 years without suffering the harsh Truce-Breaker penalty.)
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has a truce with at least one other character, or another character has a truce with [Root.GetHerHim]
The truce between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is broken!
A non-aggression pact is created between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].
The non-aggression pact between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is cancelled.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] does NOT have a favor from [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.GetTitledFirstName] have favors on each other
There is at least one player who does NOT already own the [This.GetFullBaseName]
There is at least one player who does NOT already own or claim the [This.GetFullBaseName]
There is at least one claimant for the §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§!
§PSomething went wrong - please inform the mod dev!§!\nAll other characters' claims on the §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§! are §Rremoved§!.
This is NOT some kind of §Yspecial landless title§! (eg. temporary, rebel, adventurer, mercenary, holy order, adventurer)
Has NOT already founded [Root.GetHerHis] own dynasty
[This.Location.GetName] is NOT the traditional capital of [This.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]'s primary title ([This.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetFullBaseName])
[This.GetFullBaseName] is de jure part of [This.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]'s primary title ([This.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetFullBaseName])
[This.GetFullBaseName] is de jure part of a kingdom title existing in [This.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]'s realm
[This.Location.GetName] does NOT have the same culture as [This.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.Location.GetName] does NOT have the same religion as [This.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.Location.GetName] has a neighbouring province with different culture
[This.Location.GetName] has a neighbouring province with different religion
§YThe neighbour is chosen randomly - try again to see another option.§!
§YThere is only one valid neighbour for this decision - you won't see any other options if you try again.§!
§M(ED:MP)§! Non-aggression pact forcibly removed by host
§M(ED:MP)§! Non-aggression pact forcibly removed by host

§M(ED:MP)§! [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has been granted extreme vitality by a power beyond [Root.GetHerHis] understanding. For as long as this vitality lasts, [Root.GetSheHe] will probably survive any injury or disease that is not immediately fatal.

§M(ED:MP)§! [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has been granted an extreme boost to [Root.GetHerHis] demesne limit by a power beyond [Root.GetHerHis] understanding. For as long as this lasts, [Root.GetSheHe] will not suffer any negative effects from having an excessively-large quantity of holdings.

§M(ED:MP)§! [Root.GetTitledFirstName] (or [Root.GetHerHis] predecessor) has been granted 1,000¤ by a power beyond [Root.GetHerHis] understanding.\n§g.§!\n§gINFO: This modifier (or stack of modifiers) exists solely for external record-keeping - it has no in-game function, and it is safe to remove via console command.§!

§M(ED:MP)§! [Root.GetTitledFirstName] (or [Root.GetHerHis] predecessor) has had 100¤ removed by a power beyond [Root.GetHerHis] understanding.\n§g.§!\n§gINFO: This modifier (or stack of modifiers) exists solely for external record-keeping - it has no in-game function, and it is safe to remove via console command.§!
Was killed by a power beyond [Root.GetHerHis] understanding

column1: # Grant Trade Post Limit (Buildings, Triggers, Event Modifiers)

column2: An enterprising soul in this settlement has "discovered" a so-called "Principle of Free Trade", and won't stop talking about it to anyone who will listen. This is seriously upsetting for the established mercantilist interests in the area, so it's almost certain that this lunatic will encounter an "accident" fairly soon. Make the most of the supposed "benefits" while they last!
[This.GetBestName] does NOT have an §M(ED:MP)§! §YUnlimited Free Trade§! building in their realm
This building will be automatically §Rdestroyed§! in §Y3 months' time§!
§M(ED:MP)§! Countdown to the Destruction of Unlimited Free Trade
Everyone knows that free trade is a completely impractical idea which can never work in practice.\nIt will be §Rremoved§! once this modifier expires.
